_sText:
Zm_toxic_v2b125 - by krassell

Second version and 125th build of zm_toxic. 
Beta version - Fully playable but some bugs are possible. Write here all bugs you found in my map.
Map is very small, there only are a few camping spots. I warned you, so dont whine.

History:

Survivors broke in the old abandoned facility in search of shelter but zombie madness aleady was there and infection starts it's bloody journey from dead to living.

Gameplay:
Gameplay includes some unique things like healing machine and fire that can ignite player. Use them wisely! I tried to do no spots with one way in.

Extra area: It is very secret, most clever will find tips.

Other:
Actually it is my first serious project/release for CS:S so be nice.
All found bugs you can post here.
I think i paked all textures in bsp. if you got any textures missed post here.
I would to thank S-LoW for nice alien skin
